column5: I don't know why but I want one of these things ! Wonder if the mechanics are temperamental or tough. Guy has an Aussie accent so I'm presuming it's a tough mother machine.  http://www.theglobeandmail.com/globe-drive/car-life/drive-video/video-amphibious-atv-coming-to-a-dealership-near-you/article4613483/
Did he say $40,000 dollars   :w00t:  :w00t: Good luck with that.  Very cool though.
I thought for sure,you would be all over one.LOL
Very cool.  Maybe one day it will come down in price enough that I can afford one!
